page.title: 20SOCIAL CONCERNS IN FORDYCE
page.content: Recently we have noticed in the local paper "The Banffshire Journal" 3 things about which the people in Fordyce seem especially concerned. l. As part of the improvements of the village,it was proposed to build Pub- lic Toilets,but agreement has not yet been reached as to where they should be sited.The 2 most likely sites are in the square near the castle or in the new amenity park,"The Bleachy". 2. A resident of Fordyce wished to build a bungalow in his very large garden,but,although he agreed to all conservation requirements,his application was refused. 3. An old 'right-of-way' linking Fordyce with Sandend has been closed for a number of years because remains of a stone dyke have been allowed to block it.Some villagers are now try- ing to have it re-opened.
